items.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. Typically, a standard website project takes 4-8 weeks from initial consultation to launch. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our discovery phase.

items.question: What is your pricing structure?
items.answer: We offer flexible pricing based on your specific needs. Our packages range from starter solutions to enterprise-level custom development. Contact us for a personalized quote tailored to your requirements.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance and support packages. This includes regular updates, security monitoring, performance optimization, and technical support. We have various support tiers to match your needs.

items.question: Can you work with our existing systems?
items.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in integrating with existing platforms and systems. Our team will assess your current infrastructure and ensure seamless integration with minimal disruption to your operations.

items.question: What technologies do you use?
items.answer: We use modern, industry-standard technologies including React, TypeScript, Node.js, and cloud platforms. We choose the best tools for each project to ensure scalability, performance, and maintainability.

items.question: How do you ensure project quality?
items.answer: We follow rigorous quality assurance processes including code reviews, automated testing, performance audits, and user acceptance testing. Every project goes through multiple checkpoints before delivery.
